scene.name: Go game setup
scene.description: A Go board (Goban) placed on a table with two bowls containing black and white stones

task.name: Play a move in Go
task.description: Pick up a stone from the bowl and place it on an intersection of the Go board
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will practice playing Go. The goal is to pick up a stone and place it accurately on the board.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要练习下围棋。目标是从棋罐中取出一枚棋子并准确地落在棋盘上。

subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Start playing the Go game.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：开始下围棋操作。

steps.description: Start playing Go by picking up a stone and placing it on the board

constraints.notes: The stone should be held between the index and middle fingers (traditional grip) and placed on a grid intersection.
